mutants.code:
def assert_unique_chars(text_sequence):
    text_sequence = text_sequence.replace(' ', '')
    text_sequence = text_sequence.lower()
    text_sequence = ''.join((c for c in text_sequence if c.isalpha()))
    is_unique = len(set(text_sequence)) != len(text_sequence)
    return is_unique

def assert_unique_chars(text_sequence):
    text_sequence = text_sequence.replace('', '')
    text_sequence = text_sequence.lower()
    text_sequence = ''.join((c for c in text_sequence if c.isalpha()))
    is_unique = len(set(text_sequence)) == len(text_sequence)
    return is_unique

def assert_unique_chars(text_sequence):
    text_sequence = text_sequence.replace(' ', 'MUTATED')
    text_sequence = text_sequence.lower()
    text_sequence = ''.join((c for c in text_sequence if c.isalpha()))
    is_unique = len(set(text_sequence)) == len(text_sequence)
    return is_unique

mutants.original_line: text_sequence = ''.join(c for c in text_sequence if c.isalpha())
mutants.mutated_line: text_sequence = 'MUTATED'.join((c for c in text_sequence if c.isalpha()))
mutants.code:
def assert_unique_chars(text_sequence):
    text_sequence = text_sequence.replace(' ', '')
    text_sequence = text_sequence.lower()
    text_sequence = 'MUTATED'.join((c for c in text_sequence if c.isalpha()))
    is_unique = len(set(text_sequence)) == len(text_sequence)
    return is_unique
